statements: SELECT id, temperature, humidity, wind_speed, recorded_at, drone_id FROM WeatherData;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE recorded_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE wind_speed BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY recorded_at ASC
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM WeatherData
SELECT AVG(wind_speed) AS avg_wind_speed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM WeatherData
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE drone_id = 101
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT MAX(temperature), AVG(humidity) FROM weather_data
SELECT * FROM crop_performance ORDER BY yield DESC
SELECT crop_id, yield, pests_detected FROM crop_performance WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drone_id, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND wind_speed > 10;
SELECT * FROM crop_performance WHERE yield > 5000 AND pests_detected = true ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT crop_id, pests_detected FROM crop_performance WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY drone_id HAVING drone_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY max_humidity DESC, avg_temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25.0
SELECT id, drone_id, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, crop_id, yield, timestamp FROM CropPerformance WHERE yield > 100.0 LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WeatherCropCorrelation WHERE correlation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT id, weather_id, crop_id FROM WeatherCropCorrelation WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_id, AVG(yield) AS average_yield FROM CropPerformance GROUP BY crop_id HAVING AVG(yield) > 100 ORDER BY average_yield DESC;
SELECT WeatherData.*, CropPerformance.yield FROM WeatherData INNER JOIN CropPerformance ON WeatherData.drone_id = CropPerformance.id WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT weather_id, crop_id, correlation_score FROM WeatherCropCorrelation WHERE correlation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM WeatherData GROUP BY temperature, humidity, wind_speed HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY data_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT location, battery_level FROM DroneData WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE planting_date <= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM PerformanceData ORDER BY yield DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT location, battery_level, status FROM DroneData WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY battery_level ASC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropData WHERE harvest_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY planting_date
SELECT drone_id, location, timestamp FROM DroneData WHERE location LIKE 'Farm%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT crop_id, yield, quality FROM PerformanceData WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY quality DESC
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT location, temperature FROM drones WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_performance WHERE temperature_threshold < 30;
SELECT drone_id, weather_id, crop_id FROM drone_data WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT drone_id, location FROM drones;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_performance ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT w.*, c.temperature_threshold FROM weather_data w JOIN crop_performance c ON w.temperature > c.temperature_threshold;

SELECT d.location, w.date, c.yield, cd.correlation_value FROM drones d JOIN drone_data dd ON d.drone_id = dd.drone_id JOIN weather_data w ON dd.weather_id = w.weather_id JOIN crop_performance c ON dd.crop_id = c.crop_id JOIN correlation_data cd ON dd.drone_data_id = cd.drone_data_id WHERE cd.correlation_value > 0.7;
